analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/11/0x357509df502c01db19e45d67d76a96be44d7592e.sol:
	Contract PonziRevolutionBeam has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/11/0x357509df502c01db19e45d67d76a96be44d7592e.sol#208)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/11/0x357509df502c01db19e45d67d76a96be44d7592e.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/11/0x357509df502c01db19e45d67d76a96be44d7592e.sol#4-6): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/11/0x357509df502c01db19e45d67d76a96be44d7592e.sol#76-77) is not in mixedCase
